titles.title: Anti-Drug Legalization Act
To prohibit federally sponsored research pertaining to the legalization of drugs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Criminal Justice, Drug Policy and Human Resources.

committee.subcommittee: Criminal Justice, Drug Policy and Human Resources
committee.name: House Government Reform

bill.summary: 1/3/2001--Introduced. Anti-Drug Legalization Act - Prohibits any Federal department or agency from conducting or financing any study or research involving the legalization of any controlled substance.
